original_text: Approximated working hours of American, German and Chinese scientists using time stamps from paper downloads. Conclusions: (1) Scientists have almost no weekends. (2) Chinese scientists have fixed schedules for lunch and dinner, where as the Americans like working at night.
text: Approximated working hours of American, German and Chinese scientists using time stamps from paper downloads. Conclusions: (1) Scientists have almost no weekends. (2) Chinese scientists have fixed schedules for lunch and dinner, where as the Americans like working at night.
